attributes.action: urge the Japanese Government to put an end to the inhumane slaughter of Dolphins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year, Japanese fishing communities carry out an inhumane harvest of dolphins, with shocking disdain for the pain and suffering of these intelligent mammals. It is widely agreed that dolphins are amongst the most intelligent creatures on the planet, and there is evidence to suggest their extreme stress and anguish in the period up to their brutal slaughter. The video on this link is graphic and shocking. Please only view this video after careful consideration of who might be watching it with you. - 
http://www.glumbert.com/media/dolphin -
The people signing this petition urge the UK Government to express the extreme distate of the UK population towards this barbaric act. Furthermore, we urge the Prime Minister to do all in his power to bring an end to the methods employed by the Japanese fishing communities.
